skills.skill: Microsoft Office (Access, Excel, Word, Outlook, Power Point)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Track supplier performance, lead times, and manage metrics and reporting of said suppliers.
Support overall management of supplier quality and performance to meet tactical business goals.
Support and assist in maintaining and documenting equipment for inventory management, in support of Development initiatives, replacement parts, and new restaurant openings.
Work closely with Kitchen Equipment Supplier (KES) and independent equipment manufacturers on performance and KPIs of deliverables and production timelines.
On-site monitoring of new restaurant openings of KES performance and ensuring new store openings are receiving complete packages to support opening dates.
Compile and retrieve reporting data to provide detailed reporting of the supply chain flow of goods and informational analysis.
Manage all sample requests as required cross-functionally and follows up accordingly.
Collaborate and support R&D Team with new initiatives requiring kitchen equipment and/or smallwares.
Perform other ad hoc tasks and duties as assigned, with or without accommodation, in support of the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in supply chain, business, or equivalent offset experience in related fields.
